result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

(Clerked by WHoefferle)
Defendant Kip R Olson not in court.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

This also covers 15CF184.
Default Forfeitures in both cases.

7/15/15 Letter from Defendant to Judge Bitney regarding jail time and return of property.

Clerked by AP. 
Defendant Kip R Olson in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Defendant Kip R Olson in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CF286, 15CF117, 15CF184, 15CF232 AND 15TR1011

15CF286:
(Information has been filed)
State moves to amend Count #1 and Count #2 to Misdemeanor Bail Jumping 946.49(1)(a). Court grants motion.
Count #1:  Defendant pleads guilty.  Court finds defendant guilty.
Count #2:  Defendant pleads guilty.  Court finds defendant guilty.
Pay court costs.  60 days to pay.
Ct. #1:  40 days jail with huber and good time with credit for 10 days served (on count #1)
Ct. #2:  40 days jail with huber and good time to run concurrent with time on Count #1).

15CF117:
State moves, and defense approves of forfeiture of $200 cash bond posted to go to Barron County General Fund pursuant to stat . Court grants motion.
State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants motion.

15CF184:
State moves, and defense approves of forfeiture of $500 cash bond posted to go to Barron County General Fund pursuant to stat 969.13. Court grants motion.
State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants motion.

15CF232:
State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants motion.

15TR1011:
State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants motion.

Defendant Kip R Olson in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF117, 15CF184 and 15CF232 called. 15CF232 Preliminary Hearing: Officer John Smith called and sworn - Direct by State 11:19 Cross exam by Attorney Hinde 11:24 Redirect by State 11:25 Kip Olson called and sworn - Direct by Attorney Hinde 11:27 Argument by State 11:28 Argument by Attorney Hinde 11:30 Rebuttal by State - 5 minute recess 11:37 Resume - Court relates, finds State has failed to show probable cause and does not bind over on Count 1.  Not guilty plea entered to Count 2.  Count 1 is dismissed without prejudice.  All files set for  Plea hearing scheduled for July 1, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Kip R Olson in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF117,15CF184 and 15CF232
Defense requests bond modification for time and location of testings. Confirmation has not been completed with the Jail Captain. Court relates. 
Court orders the bond be amended to complete daily pbt's at the Barron County Sheriff's Department at 6 AM.

Defendant Kip R Olson in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF117 & 15CF184.

15CF184 - Preliminary Hearing and Arraignment:

Defendant stands mute. Court will enter a guilty plea on the Defendant's behalf. 
Bond continues. 

Both cases set for a plea hearing on 6/8/15 at 2:00 PM.
